author: dkhaywood
msg: (more of) renaming ...Authorisation... (with an s) to ...Authorization... (with a z); ProxyAuthorization; changes to installer-registry.properties

author: dkhaywood
msg: renamed ...Authorisation... (with an s) to ...Authorization... (with a z).  Note that the package names already used a 'z'; also its more common (US) spelling.  installer-registry.properties checked, no changes needed

author: dkhaywood
msg: changed ConfigurationLoader API to use an enum (NotFoundPolicy) instead of a boolean

author: dkhaywood
msg: for embedded, renamed PersistenceState#UNKNOWN to PersistenceState#STANDALONE

author: dkhaywood
msg: fixed bug in JavaSpecification#createObject which wasn't injecting dependencies into newly created object; now does so using the runtime context
